column4: anyone know how to turn off join/part messages in the ubuntu version of xchat?
isnt there a universal way to put that on ALL channels abchirk?
Settings->  Advanced ->  if you have the formats you can essentially disable the messages.
^hack the formats I meants to say
just drag the right bar over a bit there should be a UserList
otherwise,  Settings- > Preferences -> UserList ->  Show on Upper Right
pretend like the user list is there but minimized and drag it open
Settings-> Preferences -> User List -> Show on Right
Go to Help About what version?
you are not using the right version.
Go to Help About what version?
i installed it using the ubuntu synaptic package manager
Go to Help About what version?
then it must be something I have to dl from another source seperatly.
exit that program, go to Applications, Internet,  XChat IRC
